title: What's the chance of thew EUW player getting a PBE account?
body:
I applied for the PBE account a while ago and i am just wondering how the electing system works and what's the chance for a EUW player to get a PBE account.

Ps: i am streamer in one of the Chinese online social media and i usually do videos about the new champions since the Chinese players only get to play the new champions later than other servers.

Best regards.

replies.body: Any player from NA, EUW or EUNE is eligible to be approved for the PBE server so (to a very certain extent), you have just as much chance as your EUNE/NA counterparts. However, as of right now, the PBE Signup page is currently down so players aren't able to sign up or create PBE accounts in general.
oh okay , thank you very much for answering.
